EmailTemplate.subject: LAST CHANCE: Join Us for Cubs vs. Reds on Tuesday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/chicago-community-appreciation-cubs/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Last Chance! We hope you can join us tomorrow, August 15th, as the Chicago Cubs take on the Cincinnati Reds!
We are expecting a fantastic summer evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, baseball. We hope you will accept this invitation to join us, learn more about Turbonomic, and network with your peers in the technology industry.
Chicago Community Appreciation - Cubs vs. Reds <[[https://turbonomic.com/chicago-community-appreciation-cubs/]]> Where: Wrigley Field 1060 W. Addison St, Chicago, IL 60613 Tuesday, August 15th 8:05pm
RSVP Today! <[[https://turbonomic.com/chicago-community-appreciation-cubs/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- the Turbonomic Team
